directions: Pour the grape soda into a large punch bowl. Scoop 1/2 cup sized balls of pineapple sorbet into the soda. Float pansies on top amongst the sorbet scoops. Serve immediately with 1 scoop and 1 flower for each guest's cup.
ingredients: 18 purple pansy blossoms, cleaned and stems removed
title: Purple Pansy Bride's Punch
